name: mirorauhala.bootstrap-skeleton
title: Bootsrap 3 Skeleton
description: Add Bootstrap 3.1 HTML5 Skeleton to your page by going File > New Bootstrap 3 Document. You can also do it simply by pressing Ctrl-Shift-B! This is a fork from HTML Skeleton.
author: Miro Rauhala (https://github.com/mirorauhala)
